title: SOLD: T205 Hoblitzell (Cin 1908 on Back) Sovereign back - SGC 60

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 Hoblitzell (Cin 1908 on Back) Sovereign back - SGC 60
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling the pictured T205 Hoblitzell - Cin 1908 on back.  This one has a Sovereign back, and is graded SGC 60.  Great corners, but held to a 60 due to centering.
SOLD

Thanks for looking!
Scott
